generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap");:root{--colorPrincipal:#328cc1;--colorSecundario:#0b3c5d;--colorOscuro:#1d2731;--resaltar:#d9b310}*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{font-size:10px}body{background-color:#f5f6f0;color:#020f14;font-family:Open 16px;list-style:none;background-color:#eee;text-align:left}ul.breadcrumb li{display:inline;font-size:1.1rem}ul.breadcrumb li+li:before{padding:8px;color:#000;content:"/\00a0"}ul.breadcrumb li a{color:#0275d8;text-decoration:none}ul.breadcrumb li img{width:24px;transition:transform .2s}.contenedorRedesSociales img:hover{transform:scale(1.1)}.cabecera-logo{font-size:2.6rem;padding:8px}.cabecera-itemsLogeo{font-size:1.3rem}.cabecera-itemsNavegacion 20px;border:none;cursor:pointer}.btn:hover{background-color:var(--resaltar);color:#fff}.carrusel{width:100%}.tarjeta-list{align-items:center;height:304px;padding:10px 0;margin:0 img:hover{opacity:.85}.tarjeta-arrow{border-radius:30px;background-color:#fff;position:absolute;z-index:4;width:48px;height:48px;text-align:center;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 svg{width:12px;height:100%;color:rgba(0,0,0,.7)}.tarjeta-prev{left:0}.tarjeta-next{right:0}.bannerEmpresa{background-color:var(--colorPrincipal);color:#fff;box-shadow:0 8px 20px -4px dd{line-height:25px;margin-left:15px;font-size:1.2rem}.biografia{text-align:justify;line-height:25px}.biografia h2{padding-bottom:15px}.biografia h3{font-size:2.2rem}.biografia h3,.cuadroCita{padding-bottom:15px;padding-top:15px}.cuadroCita{position:relative;text-align:center;border-left:3px solid #000;border-right:3px solid #000;background-color:#d3d3d3}.cuadroCita h2{width:-webkit-fit-content;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content;position:relative;color:#252839;-webkit-text-stroke:.5px #383d52}.tituloClub h2:before{content:attr(data-foo);position:absolute;width:0;color:#01fe87;-webkit-text-stroke:0 #383d52;border-right:2px solid #01fe87;overflow:hidden;-webkit-animation:mostrarTitulo 6s linear infinite;animation:mostrarTitulo 6s linear infinite;white-space:nowrap}@-webkit-keyframes mostrarTitulo{0%,10%,to{width:0}70%,90%{width:100%}}@keyframes
